nhc_headline: ...STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAINS SPREADING ONSHORE ACROSS PORTIONS  OF SOUTHEASTERN NORTH CAROLINA...
summary:
...STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAINS SPREADING ONSHORE ACROSS PORTIONS  OF SOUTHEASTERN NORTH CAROLINA...
 As of 8:00 AM EDT Mon Sep 16
 the center of Eight was located near 32.7, -78.2
 with movement NW at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.
